C

close() - Method in class pager.DataPager
Close the data source, performs any cleanup as needed
close() - Method in interface pager.DataProvider
Close the provider and do any cleanup

D

DataPager<T> - Class in pager
Provides access to a collection of data paging them as needed.
DataPager(DataProvider<T>) - Constructor for class pager.DataPager
Creates an instance of DataPager
DataPagerListener<T> - Interface in pager
Listener to register to get notified about changes to the data in a DataPager
DataPagerNotifier<T> - Interface in pager
Use this to notify the DataPager clients that a data is replaced or data size changed.
DataProvider<T> - Interface in pager
Provides the actual data to DataPager

G

get(int) - Method in class pager.DataPager
Returns the data at the given position
get(int) - Method in interface pager.DataProvider
Returns the data at the given position, or throw IndexOutOfBoundsException if position is invalid
getDataPagerNotifier() - Method in class pager.DataPager
Returns the DataPagerNotifier which can be used to replace a data or update the whole data.

I

iterator() - Method in class pager.DataPager
 

N

notifyDataAdded(T, int) - Method in interface pager.DataPagerNotifier
Notify that a data is added
notifyDataRemoved(int) - Method in interface pager.DataPagerNotifier
Notify that a data is removed
notifyDataReplaced(T, T) - Method in interface pager.DataPagerNotifier
Notify that a data is replaced with another data
notifyDataSetChanged() - Method in interface pager.DataPagerNotifier
Notify that the data set has changed and needs to be re-fetched

O

onDataAdded(T, int) - Method in interface pager.DataPagerListener
Notify that a data is added
onDataRemoved(int) - Method in interface pager.DataPagerListener
Notify that a data is removed
onDataReplaced(T, T) - Method in interface pager.DataPagerListener
Called when a data is replaced with another data
onDataSetChanged() - Method in interface pager.DataPagerListener
Called when the data set changed, like size changes

P

pager - package pager
 

R

registerListener(DataPagerListener<T>) - Method in interface pager.DataPagerNotifier
 

S

setDataPagerListener(DataPagerListener<T>) - Method in class pager.DataPager
Sets a DataPagerListener to listen for data replacements or data updates
setPageSize(int) - Method in class pager.DataPager
Sets the paging size
size() - Method in class pager.DataPager
Returns the number of elements
size() - Method in interface pager.DataProvider
Returns the size of the data set
